description:
The world is all about Videos and every Business or a Product or a course requires a introduction or a promo video. Most of the companies hire professionals and spend huge costs on it. Here at this course - using Camtasia, sony Vegas Pro and other online websites - one will be able to make his own promo video or introduction video just in 5 minutes - absolutely Free of Cost.

You will learn -

  • Basics of Camtasia Video Production
  • Promo Video Creation
  • Promo Video Production
  • Choosing and adding up audio
  • Complete Step By Step guide on Video Editing and audio enhancement
  • Adding Up Logos
  • Sony Vegas Pro Introduction
  • Making your Intro in Less than 5 Minutes using Vegas Pro

The next is using a website - and creating your free intros in just less than a minute. Unbelievable right? Take this course and know the best secrets in making an Intro/Promo Video.

At the End of this course - Any one can make a promo video in less than 5 Minutes for sure using Camtasia or sony vegas pro (or) Online through a website.
title: Make Hollywood Movie Intros In 5 Minutes
